--- title: FLIR_video_stream keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "API details." ---

class FLIRVideoStream[source]

FLIRVideoStream(transform=None, queue_size=10)

Create threaded USB3 video stream for 1 or more FLIR USB3 cameras, with max queue size Pass optional transform code to alter the image before queueing

test heading¶

FLIRVideoStream.set_cam_mode_continuous[source]

FLIRVideoStream.set_cam_mode_continuous(i, cam)

FLIRVideoStream.start[source]

FLIRVideoStream.start()

For all cameras, Initialise and set camera mode to continuous. and begin acquisisition

FLIRVideoStream.more[source]

FLIRVideoStream.more()

Return True if there are still frames in the queue. If stream is not stopped, try to wait a moment

FLIRVideoStream.read[source]

FLIRVideoStream.read()

return next frame in the queue

FLIRVideoStream.queue_size[source]

FLIRVideoStream.queue_size()

Return the queue size, ie number of frames

FLIRVideoStream.stop[source]

FLIRVideoStream.stop()

indicate that the thread should be stopped
